title: HELP, i closed my laptop without quitting the game and it is not working any more!!!!
body:
hello,
so i'm new to LOL and i've been playing for 3 days now and i'm loving it,
but as i described in the title, i'm unable to join games after i quite the game unexpectedly.
whenever i try to join a game, after choosing my character just before the page with the 10 cards appear, the game freeze on black screen, i've waited for hours, tried everything possible on the internet, did a fresh install, restart, shutdown.

my device info: Macbook Pro 15" 16GB Ram 2.5 Core i7

Please i need to know how to fix this as overtime i force to quite the game the server consider it abandonment and i get banned for a game crash.

replies.body:
Sounds like you're not able to connect to the game server.  After Champion Select ends, your connection to the normal client goes dormant and your connection to the game server begins.  When that connection fails, nothing happens and you get to stare at your desktop.

I know you've tried a few things, but go ahead and go through our [Connection Troubleshooting ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#section-mac)article which should help address some of the most common causes for these connection issues. Lemme know if it helps!

Hello RiotBok

Thank you for your reply, i've tried all the methods in the troubleshooting section and nothing seems to be working, i'm pretty sure it is not a network issue as it wasn't an issue 2 days ago, all my problems happened after i quit the game (force Quitting) from the mac


any ideas on how to remove the game totally from the computer and do a fresh install, i've tried the (move the icon to the trash method) and reinstalled the game again but it didn't seem to do anything.
